amendment.description: At the end of subtitle E of title VIII, insert the following: SEC. XX. COMPETITIVE FORESTRY, NATURAL RESOURCES, AND ENVIRONMENTAL GRANTS PROGRAM. Section 1232 of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 582a-8) is amended-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 115-679 to prioritize grants for forest restoration under the Competitive Forestry, Natural Resources, and Environmental Grants Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
